domainId.description: The ID of the associated Domain.

homeEfsFileSystemUid.description: The ID of the space's profile in the Amazon Elastic File System volume.

spaceDisplayName.description: The name of the space that appears in the SageMaker Studio UI.

spaceSettings.description: A collection of space settings. See Space Settings below.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

url.description: Returns the URL of the space. If the space is created with Amazon Web Services IAM Identity Center (Successor to Amazon Web Services Single Sign-On) authentication, users can navigate to the URL after appending the respective redirect parameter for the application type to be federated through Amazon Web Services IAM Identity Center.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Space resources.
